name: Ampier HTML and AMP Email Generator
description:
Documentation


About

Ampier plugin for Figma lets you create stunning AMP and HTML email designs for your email marketing campaigns within your favorite design environment. Export production ready code that work for all common email clients, including Gmail, Apple Mail, Outlook, and others.


Why Ampier plugin

  • Intuitive Workflow. No tech skills required. Create your HTML and/or AMP email templates in a fast and convenient way.
  • HTML + AMP Code. Unique AMP for email functionality. Create, preview and export bulletproof HTML and AMP code that simply works.


Features

  • Ampier plugin generates clean and responsive HTML and AMP versions from your design
  • Create feedback forms that work right inside the email message thanks to the AMP for emails technology
  • Use special syntax to set links (URLs) to your texts and buttons
  • Define special HTML parts as fallbacks for the clients that don’t support AMP
  • Predefined assets for quick start built-in to the plugin
  • Beautiful assets packs. Check it here
  • Preview your real email at different device sizes directly
  • Make a quick screenshot to show your progress to a colleague or a client
  • Check the light mode and dark mode (regular Dark mode and Gmail dark mode on iOS)
  • Provide the invisible preheader and/or short preheader
  • No coding required! Export responsive, production ready HTML and AMP code
  • Code compression and minification to stay below the 100kbs limit for email messages
  • Download the exported .zip file with HTML, AMP and TJML parts to your computer from Figma


How to use

  1. Create your design from predefined assets or create your own with auto layout
  2. Select the root frame and run the plugin to preview your template
  3. Check desktop and mobile, dark and light modes. Export the HTML/AMP files


Questions and bug reports

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or suggestions. We’re always open to new features!
